description: Cashier, shelf stocker and customer service employee.
Sold subscriptions for various charities and commercial organizations.
Promoted well-known brands such as Samsung, SkyShowtime and Tombola by interacting with customers and getting them interested on the street or at events.
Helping customers find and purchase the perfect shoes through good and professional customer service with regard to the customer. Also webshop packages packaged and sent.
Worked at a La Place restaurant in Duinrell, including working behind the cash register, preparing food and cleaning.
Created a number of web apps for International Offices of ROC Mondriaan and a native app for Android and iOS.
